channel.title: Thapar Electoral Club
channel.description: Recent content on Thapar Electoral Club

item.title: About Us!
item.description: Objective of Forming the Electoral Club # Organize various events and student activities as desired by the Election Commissioner of Punjab/Deputy Commissioner of Punjab/Tehsildar Election of Patiala. üéâ Encourage young voters about their voting rights through various student activities on campus. üó≥Ô∏è Assist students and other staff in enrolling and obtaining their voting ID cards through the online portal. üí≥ Attend various meetings conducted by the Deputy Commissioner's office. üìÖ Participate in various competitive events organized by the Election Commissioner of Punjab.

item.title: Events in the club!
item.description: Events and Activities # The Electoral Club will organize the following events and activities: Poster making and presentation to encourage voters for their voting rights. Quiz Competition related to elections. Declamation and Debate related to elections. Short movies/video clips competition encouraging young voters. Rangoli Competition. Other events and activities as desired by the Election Commissioner of Punjab/Deputy Commissioner of Punjab/Tehsildar Election of Patiala.
